data.name: Mauled
data.detailed_description:
EARLY ACCESS. Mauled is a Free To Play, Third Person Shooter, CO-OP online, with procedural generated levels, infinite hordes of fierces creatures and many weapons to buy in citadels.

  • 1-4 player CO-OP mode: collab with other players to survive the hordes. The more united you are, the more chance you have of moving on. Use traps, powerups and more to fight.

  • Procedurally levels: each arena will procedurally generate its own environment, so every game will be different than before.

  • Citadels and merchants: each arena have a citadel. In the citadel you can buy your arsenal from merchants.

  • Increasingly strong enemies: The creatures will be much tougher and much more dangerous horde after horde, so you'll need to be well equipped ahead of time and upgrade your weaponry.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i3-3225 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i5-7300U 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The shooting system is based on dismemberment monster with blood effects.
